page.title: 20MEET YOU IN MOUNTSORREL
page.content: {The 'reccy';}swings to play on and where youths make fires or play football. {Halstead Rd.field;}old people natter or youths scramble on motorbikes. {Mountsorrel green;}benches for the old folk,conker trees for the kids. Cub/ Scout Hut on the green,which is great for games. {Temperance Hall Youth Club;}discos which are great fun and pool for 10p. {Mountsorrel Stores; }graffitti writing youths gather to smoke and laugh. The following groups of people jointly made this Survey : {Rothley Pathinders}:(mixed group of 11-14 year olds from St.Mary's Church) with special help from David Simpson & family,Chas Winder and local historian Rodney Offley{.Mountsorrel School:} (Environmental Studies Group)with help from Mr.R.Mc.Dermott and J.Kirkwood.
